name: Pachinko Gold
description:
The goal in Pachinko Gold is to score the most points in a single round. You increase your ability to earn points by collecting coins during each round, then upgrading. You can choose your upgrade path including the number of balls you start each round with, the point value of the pegs, the value of the coins that appear and more. Earning points is how you level up all the way to level 100. As you increase in your level, the amount of coins that show up on the screen also increase. There are 9 Pachinko Zones available and a new one is unlocked each time you level up 10 levels! While there’s certainly some luck involved, this is a game of skill. Who will score the most points in a single round?

Once you’ve upgraded everything, and as you continue to improve your high score, the coins you earn you can put towards collecting Shamrocks. When you are logged in to Apple’s Game Center, you can compete with the world to see who has the most Shamrocks! Who will collect the most Shamrocks?

Features:
Fun for all ages
Simple and enjoyable game play
100 levels to achieve
9 Pachinko Zones (Clouds, Underwater, Mini-Golf and more!)
Choose your upgrades!
Game Center (Achievements & Leaderboards)
Shamrocks (requires Game Center)
Real Physics

Pachinko is the Japanese form of Pinball.

You can earn coins in each level, and if you choose you can give yourself a boost by purchasing coins via in app purchase.
